food_trailer.name: 7x10 Food Trailer
food_trailer.body:
Water package: 30g Fresh/45g Grey Tanks, Electric 6g Water Heater, Water Pump
Electrical package: 2 Double Outlets 110v, 30amp electric service (4 Breakers), 1 LED Light (interior), 2 LED Light Reflectors (exterior)
Sink package: Triple Sink (12x12x10) and Handwashing Sink (12x10x6)
A/C heater unit: 12000 BTUs
Concession window: with Pass-out Window and exterior counter
Working table: 72x16in stainless steel

restroom_trailer.name: 7x10 2-Stall Restroom Trailer
restroom_trailer.body:
Water package: 2 53gal Fresh Water Tanks, 1 53gal Grey Water Tank, 2 48gal Waste Water Tanks and 2 Water Pumps
Electrical package: 2 Double Outlets 110v, 30amp Service, 4 breakers box, 3 Interior Lights
2 RV Toilets with Water Hose
2 Handwashing Sinks
2 Cabinets
1 Machine Room
1 RV Flush Waste Valves
3 30" Door w/Flush Lock

office_trailer.name: Mobile Office trailer 8x16
office_trailer.body:
Construction offices, residential sales area, mobile booths, warehouses, bedrooms, mobile classrooms, etc.
With dimensions from 3 meters to 16 meters, with capacity from one person to 25 people.
With mini-splits, bathrooms, windows, kitchenette area, desks, 110 v and 220 v electrical installation, meeting room and much more.

office_trailer.name: Mobile Office trailer 8x24
office_trailer.body:
• Electrical Package: 8 double outlets 110V, 30 Amp service, 2 interior lights.
  • (2) 6’ x 4’ Slide windows with screen
  • (1) 33” Door
  • Private Office
  • Steps for entrance
  • Interior height : 7 ft
  • A/C heater unit: 12000 BTUs
  • Insulated ceiling & walls
